===Etymology===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} – a wooden (木) plow with originally three cross lines (彡) for the [[furrow]]s of the plow, later simplified to two.

Also Singpore {{Han simp|來|f=从|t=二}} in 1969-1976.
